name: Gordon Craigie
message: Seeing AI implemented into games to actually talk to via microphone, where it plays characters and recreate a real humans voice, while displaying situational awareness and using the games lore to respond is insane. So much potential for the future

name: Bwalya Erico
message: I can't believe it's more intelligent than me this thing without a heart or soul... But I'm still waiting until I start using it to download food and money on the internet
